summary: Completed testing of FitQuest Phase 2 - 269 exercises database and chrono page. Backend API tests 100% pass (16/16). Exercise database expanded from 180 to 269 exercises with proper category distribution. ChronoPage includes all professional features: pre-count, beeps, voice synthesis, save/load sequences.

issues: Requires Google Auth to test interactively - code review shows proper implementation

passed_tests: ✅ All 7 categories present: legs(56), core(44), back(43), arms(35), chest(34), shoulders(33), cardio(24)
✅ Category filtering works for all 7 categories (/api/exercises?category=chest)
✅ All exercises have required fields (name, category, muscle_groups, description, instructions, tips, equipment, difficulty)
✅ All exercises have valid difficulty levels (débutant, intermédiaire, avancé)
✅ Single exercise retrieval by ID works
✅ Login page loads correctly with FITQUEST branding
✅ Google Auth button present and clickable
✅ ChronoPage route protected - redirects to login when not authenticated
✅ ChronoPage code includes all features: pre-count, beeps, voice, save/load sequences
critical_code_review_comments: ChronoPage.jsx properly implements professional interval timer with: Web Audio API for beeps (playBeep, playWarningBeep, playFinalBeep), Speech Synthesis for voice instructions, localStorage for save/load sequences, pre-count countdown, data-testid attributes for testing
updated_files: /app/backend/tests/test_exercises_v2.py - New test file for 269 exercises database

success_rate.frontend: Code review passed - ChronoPage requires Google Auth to test UI interactively

seed_data_creation: 269 exercises seeded via startup event in server.py
context_for_next_testing_agent: Backend exercises API fully tested with 269 exercises. Distribution: legs=56, core=44, back=43, arms=35, chest=34, shoulders=33, cardio=24. ChronoPage requires Google Auth - code review confirms implementation of: pre-count (preCountSeconds setting), beeps via Web Audio API (playBeep, playWarningBeep, playFinalBeep), voice synthesis (speak function using speechSynthesis), save/load sequences (localStorage STORAGE_KEY='fitquest_chrono_sequences'), interval management (add, edit, delete, duplicate, reorder).
